text: Would <https://github.com/Blosc/c-blosc2> be a version bump of Blosc_jll.jl or would end up as a distinct binary package such as Blosc2_jll.jl ?

elements.text: be a version bump of Blosc_jll.jl or would end up as a distinct binary package such as Blosc2_jll.jl ?

text: what's the relation between blosc and blosc2?  is there the risk original blosc will have a release v2?

elements.text: what's the relation between blosc and blosc2?  is there the risk original blosc will have a release v2?

text:
I think C-Blosc2 is release v2 in beta:
"C-Blosc2 is the new major version of <https://github.com/Blosc/c-blosc|C-Blosc>, with full support for 64-bit containers, filter pipelining, new filters, new codecs and dictionaries for improved compression ratio."

elements.text:
